name: Brawl Stars-dle
description:
Guess the brawler! You have 6 tries to guess a brawler - good luck! Some info you might want to know:
  • type in the brawler names exactly how they are in the game (so don't forget the - in 8-bit etc)
  • the number of projectiles can be confusing for some brawlers - it's the number it shows in the in-game info screen:
    1.   -> 1 projectile
    2.   -> 6 projectiles
  • if brawlers have multiple forms (like Bonnie or Meg) the stats are for the default form (the one you spawn with)
